name: Uprooted (Errantimarum)
description:
A Game About Coming Home.

After a long flight , and a full semester of classes Dylan wants to come home and spend it relaxing.  However they have forgotten the roots that they have escaped, will they forget the roots they had made?

A simple dinner, the first one since they had left many months prior.  What has changed since then?

What even is home?

Features Original Music
Partial  Sound
Multiple Endings
Achievements
Partial Screen reader  access and audio subtitles Made for North Shore Global Game Jam Theme: Roots

Made in 2 days for this jam!

Our team consists of beginner game makers, testing the waters with this visual novel.
